div.h2: KIPP Texas Public Schools are tuition-free, academically excellent schools preparing students to pursue college, career, and beyond.
The path to and through college starts at KIPP.
Like our mission? Join our movement!

img.h3: Click here for details on grab & go meal pickup.

img.p: KIPP Texas Public Schools has 55 schools and 29,000 students pre-K through 12 with plans to grow to 100,000 students.
Select a city for more information about your local schools.
KIPP Texas students graduate college at a rate three times higher than the national average for low-income students.

section.h2: KIPP Through College: a Distinctive Difference
section.p: KIPP’s dedication to our students doesn’t end at high school graduation. KIPP Through College supports students college entry through graduation and plays a critical role in our students’ long-term success.

div.p: © 2019 KIPP Texas Public Schools. All Rights Reserved. Website By Sundaram.

p.em: KIPP Texas is committed to equal treatment for all individuals. KIPP Texas does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, gender, disability, age, religion, sexual orientation, or national or ethnic origin.
